com.brinybeach.tinywebserver

Class HttpResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brinybeach.tinywebserver.HttpResponse

  • public class HttpResponse
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrap the HTTP response attributes. author: bryantbunderson

    • Constructor Summary

      Create an empty HttpResponse from the status code

      Create a HttpResponse populated from a file

      • HttpResponse

        public HttpResponse(int code,
                    java.lang.String contentUri)
             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Create a HttpResponse populated from a file
        Parameters:
        code - the HTTP status code
        contentUri - the path to the file on the local file system
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file isn't found

      • HttpResponse

        public HttpResponse(int code,
                    java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                    long length,
                    java.lang.String contentType)
        Create a HttpResponse populated from the InputStream
        Parameters:
        code - the status Code
        inputStream - the InputStream with the characters
        length - the expected length of the content
        contentType - the content mimi-type
